item.title: Brendan Lake Probabilistic Program Induction
item.description: Brendan Lake Assistant Professor at NYU and Research Scientist at Facebook AI Research. He builds computational models of everyday cognitive abilities, focusing on problems that are easier for people than they are for machines. Probabilistic Program Induction
